data.text:
Forum Threads Posts Last Post FINAL PUSH to Summer 2021: Justgiving - Please donate

Final funding push - Get me to Summer 2021 and we are good to go for the future!!! Please help me raise Â£1,200 to get there! https://www.justgiving.com/crowdfunding/finalpushsportsbabble2020?utm_term=jWMKvbkR2

1 3 Just Giving

13-10-2020, 10:21

by Stairs NakedWines

NakedWines are a new funding opportunity - but it needs you to sign and buy your wine through them. Please take the plunge - get your friends to log on and do the same. Each new member gets money into Sportsbabble and keeps us running

1 1 I signed up and bought a ...

03-04-2020, 10:59

by Stairs Member comments

If you have comments or suggestions on funding the site - Please add any comments here

0 0

Never

How to become a member of this forum

Sadly due to rogue membership applications you need to have email and registration to be approved. Follow the process, be patient - Any delay email me to hurry things along at sportsbabble@gmail.com This is a great forum with fantastic people contributing with passion and we don't want it ruined by a mindless few.

1 3 Guests and new members

08-09-2014, 17:53

by Stairs Forum Threads Posts Last Post Jumpers for goal posts

Most of us will have played a sport, or still do, for club, scouts or a local team. Potentially some have gone further? We all have our own stories. Things we are proud of, moments of hilarity or disaster. Do tell......
